items.sentence: Tom opened one of his notebooks and started writing down ideas for a new novel.
The reason my parents don't like my boyfriend is because he doesn't have a job.
Tom and the rest of the basketball team stole a school bus and drove to Boston.
Those who use forks or chopsticks often think people who don't are uncivilized.
How much time do you spend every day helping your children with their homework?
I have to admit that hanging out with Tom all day was more fun than I expected.
We have to ask ourselves whether building a bridge here will be worth the cost.
Tom wondered how long it would be before Mary realized John wasn't coming back.
I've already told Tom that I plan on staying in Boston for another three weeks.
The school that Tom goes to is by far the best one in this part of the country.
